basics.name: Zehao Mo
basics.summary: Highly motivated and disciplined Ph.D. candidate in Computer Science with expertise in Natural Language Understanding (NLU), Large Language Models (LLMs), Generative AI, and Multimodality. Extensive experience in model fine-tuning including Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) and Direct Preference Optimization (DPO). Passionate about identifying, researching, and solving complex problems in AI.

work.summary: Primary role focuses on optimizing prompts for text-to-video generation. Applied Supervised Fine-Tuning and Direct Preference Optimization to improve generation quality and address specific bad cases in video output.
highlights: Optimized prompts for text-to-video generation systems
Applied SFT to achieve high-quality prompt refinement
Used DPO to address specific bad cases in generated video output

work.summary: Primary focus on optimizing the underlying Flash Attention operator from a foundational level, directly enhancing its core mechanics to improve inference speed and critical performance metrics.
highlights: Optimized Flash Attention operator at foundational level
Enhanced core mechanics for improved performance
Increased inference speed and critical performance metrics

work.summary: Focused on embedding training for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and utilization of agentic proxies. Conducted SFT on insurance datasets followed by DPO optimization.
highlights: Developed embedding training for RAG systems
Applied DPO to achieve 96% Top-3rate for retrieval system

work.company: Shanghai NIO Automobile Co., Ltd, Beijing Subsidiary
work.summary: Developed and optimized algorithms for AI systems. Created a comprehensive pipeline voice service based on Whisper and Llama2 providing complete conversational experience.
highlights: Developed pipeline voice service using Whisper and Llama2

education.area: Bachelor of Data Science and Big Data Technology
courses: Big Data Analytics and Its Applications
